anathema: Cut a gem for aesthetic purposes, defile nature, allow the irresponsible use of magic
edict: Practice herbalism, use and enchant gems, encourage and teach magicians and jewelers, preserve elven magic and knowledge
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Yuelral (The Wise)](/Deities.aspx?ID=463)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 308

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Elven Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=9)

**Edicts** Practice herbalism, use and enchant gems, encourage and teach magicians and jewelers, preserve elven magic and knowledge

**Anathema** Cut a gem for aesthetic purposes, defile nature, allow the irresponsible use of magic

**Area of Concern**
Crystal, jewelers, magic

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Constitution or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=35)

**Favored Weapon** [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=358)

**Domains** [Creation](/Domains.aspx?ID=68), [Earth](/Domains.aspx?ID=73), [Knowledge](/Domains.aspx?ID=80), [Magic](/Domains.aspx?ID=82)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Shattering Gem](/Spells.aspx?ID=2364)

- **2nd**
[Shape Wood](/Spells.aspx?ID=1668)

- **3rd**
[One with Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=1619)

- **4th**
[Shape Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=1667)

- **5th**
[Nature's Pathway](/Spells.aspx?ID=1613)

- **6th**
[Tangling Creepers](/Spells.aspx?ID=1714)

- **7th**
[Unfettered Pack](/Spells.aspx?ID=1733)

- **8th**
[Burning Blossoms](/Spells.aspx?ID=878)

- **9th**
[Nature’s Enmity](/Spells.aspx?ID=2010)

</column>
